item.description:
Dear Members,

I have decided to switch the group ovwer to Facebook by January 20th because everyone is telling me it is easier! I will get back to you about how to register there and what the group will be called!

See you on January 16th at the Meadows, 1-4pm!!!!!

Small dog hugs,
Kim

Here are the details of my last email.

We will meet next on January 16th, 2011, Sunday at Holliston Meadows, 1-4pm. This turns out to be our 7th Anniversary meeting. Please come and help us celebrate.

Please email me and let me know if you can come plus give me your current email address. I am lacking a credit card with which to renew our meetup.com subscription, so if it expires, I will find a way to renew, but I might have to communicate with you separately, directly to your email address.

You can send your responses to:

robinberry519@gmail.com

or

laptopmaltese@aol.com.

Also, please hold on to my phone numbers in case you need them. Also please feel free to send me yours, too, in case I have to reach you for future meets.

Small dog best,
Kim
508 561 6881
508 380 6829

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: BOSTON MALTESE & TINY DOG MEET SUNDAY Jan. 16th, Sunday, 1-4pm
